thread.title: Samantha Donlon
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Samantha Donlon

author: Samantha Donlon
title: Samantha Donlon
text: Never ordered with Country Attire before but they had some great offers on Babour jackets (amongst other things). Ordered a jacket each for me and the other half speedy service, was kept up-to-date throughout and happy with the goods. Will be using Country Attire again in the future.
